haefeleuser wrote:
<snip />

> You wrote in your earlier answer that you wouldn't use DbUnit for
> building test data and that you would use the ORM to do it. Or did I
> misunderstood you?

No, I had lost the context of the discussion. I would use DbUnit or the 
ORM, whichever was simpler. In your case, I'd use the ORM.

But, even better, I'd use a fake (not a mock!) Data Repository layer 
when testing Business Logic without worrying about where in particular 
the data comes from.
